comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "These daughters of a wealthy family involved in metallurgical and municipal circles in Swansea are featured in many photographs taken by the Dillwyn Llewelyn family. The family resided at Llanynior, Gower." – Welsh Pioneers (NLW)

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comments and for including that important link to the Welsh Pioneers. I hope that well be interesting to others who are looking at the Mary Dillwyn collection of images. You are obviously interested in her work?
